title: Monopoly Casino Vegas Edition
description:
Monopoly Casino Vegas Edition
PC | Casual Setup | 50 MB
 
Monopoly Casino &#039;Vegas Edition is the next generation of the highly successful Monopoly Casino family. Gambling fans of dice cards slots and more can play the most popular slot machines and games with a classic Monopoly flair.

Monopoly Casino &#039;Vegas Edition is a complete casino simulation game that features a variety of classic gaming experiences including Blackjack Craps Roulette and Keno all in an amazing 3-D world.

Players will feel like they&#039;re standing in front of their favorite gaming table. It&#039;s real Vegas excitement for people who love to wheel and deal go for broke and win big!

There&#039;s something for everyone at the Monopoly Casino &#039;Vegas Edition.

Vista Maybe Excluded
Windows 95/98
Pentium 166 MHz or faster
32 MB RAM
150 MB free hard disk space
DirectX 8.0 (included) or higher
DirectX 8.0-compatible 2 MB SVGA-compatible video card
DirectX 8.0-compatible Windows 95/98/Me-compatible video card
